document.full_text: commodities giant glencore is set to launch a roughly $10 billion public offering on thursday, when it outlines plans for a may market debut that will make multi-millionaires of its partners and boost its deal-making capacity.
document.title: glencore set to detail plans for $10 billion listing
lines_and_colors: commodities giant glencore is set to launch a roughly $10 billion public offering on thursday, when it outlines plans for a may market debut that will make multi-millionaires of its partners and boost its deal-making capacity.
